_sText:
This is remake of old and for the majority of players unknown map. Old version was awful (bugs, no lighting, shitty textures) and in Hammer editor it was far worse. So I erased the nearly 100% of the entire map and built it again. All bugs are (I hope) fixed. The main plot of map is now set in spooky old mines. Who will win the map, can open the mine for zombies and let them kill all players.
Contains:
- new levels
- dark atmosphere
- new traps
- music, minor sound effects
- HDR lighting
